This is a new blog by Larry Vincent that is dedicated to data science, marketing research and consumer psychology. It is a perfect companion to [The Findings Report](http://www.findingsreport.com), a blog and a podcast that explores why people buy, like and share. Opinions expressed here are by the author and do not represent the views of [UTA](http://www.unitedtalent.com) or the [University of Southern California](http://www.usc.edu).
